texto: Software Development Plan (SDP). ISO/IEC/IEEE 24748‚Äê5 provides more detail on software engineering technical management planning and includes an annotated outline for an SDP. Planning for the project is often captured in a Project Management Plan. ISO/IEC/IEEE 16326 provides more detail on project planning. NOTE 2 The strategy activities and tasks from each of the other processes provide inputs and are integrated in the Project Planning process. The Project Assessment and Control process is used to help ensure that the plans are integrated, aligned, and feasible. c) Activate the project.
